response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its unique features and benefits, we are extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase this product at a special price of $950,000. We understand the significance of such an investment and trust that this offer represents a fair and advantageous transaction for both parties. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of seamless service and support throughout the process. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
